message.body: I suck. We're going out to dinner. Can I call tomorrow?
Ok
So we're in the hospital now! So far so good. 90% effaced, low station, not too dilated yet but trying accupressure before chemical assistance.
Yeah, little shell-shocked but holding up ok.
I figured since you're across the country I would fill you in...
Yep.
Will do!
Alive and well. Haven't been this tired since I stayed up all night studying for orgo 3 and downed 4 nodoze before the test
Yeah. Though I did rock that test
She's still there. I'm going to take care of the pets. Will call in a sec
Does Elon's name have an accent in it? And is it spelled that way?
No and no. It is Elan & often gets autocorrected with an accent bc there's an old noun based on a French word.
Ah. Yeah saw it with an accent on Facebook. Was it ever Elon? For some reason I thought that.
I thought it was going to be like that but she overrode me
Well we saw the latest picture and he's adorable.
More to come
Oh yeah!
I've definitely begun to appreciate smartphone tech now.
We have gotten video streaming to work so if you want to meet your nephew at some point, let me know :-)
I will put skype on the fon. Also have my laptop setup. And we're getting an iPad for facetime
Are you around today?
Absolutely!
Several right now. Michal has one plus mom and dad are here with theirs
She just got the iPhone. I think dad is getting us an iPad
We're here. Cally has her iPhone and Dad is here too also you can call his fon
Hi. I didn't really get a chance to talk to you during that pow-wow. Are you free for just a couple minutes at some point?
Ok gibe me 2 minutes
Forgot to mention on the phone earlier. We discussed and would be honored to care for Elan should the unmentionable happen.
Hey bro, just wanted to wish you an early happy birthday and best wishes with the race tomorrow! I was gonna say break a leg but that doesn't seem right :-)
Just saw the pic... 3rd in your age group? Awesome! Congrats and happy birthday!
And the pain you were having before? It didn't happen?
Hey bro! You around?
Sure!
I have pilates and Cally has a doctor's appt. What about Thursday?
Give me a couple minutes but yeah!
Sorry didn't mean to call yet
Sure
Actually I use an email address. We got a WiFi only iPad
Ok go for it
